name: Mission 1545
description: MISSION 1545 is a stealth adventure game set in a fantastical Tudor London Underworld.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU E8400 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 280 or Nvidia Quadro FX 1700 Storage: 3600 MB available space Additional Notes: Could run on lower but these are the lowest we tested.
